Birds are avian enemies found on Ape Atoll, Crash Island, and the Life altar. They attack with melee and can be assigned as Slayer assignments by Turael, Jacquelyn, and Spria. Although they are airborne, they use melee and are weakest to Earth spells.

When assigned as a slayer task, you can also kill other low-level birds such as seagulls and chickens.

  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 Universal drops
  • 3 Graphical updates
  • 4 Update history

Drops[edit | edit source]

Universal drops[edit | edit source]

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.
